title: Music Theory Trainer
summary: Interactive music theory training program written in VBA using Microsoft Office's UI capabilities. I completed this project for my freshman year musical instrument engineering course. We made the circuit diagram and build from scratch and wrote a corresponding MATLAB program to process the user input and play back a 12 tone scale.

title: Breadboard Synth
summary: Functional synthesizer built on a breadboard and run through a custom MATLAB program.
